website_summaries.verdict: Solid choice for an inexpensive water pitcher that turns acidic tap water alkaline.
pros: LCD filter indicator alerts you when its time to change the filter
Also compatible with a Brita filter, a popular feature
Removes chlorine and fluoride from drinking water
cons: Pitcher construction is a bit flimsy, especially the lid
nonetheless water comes out tasting great

customer_reviews.title: Warmery is great. I tested the PH in the first day ...
customer_reviews.text: Warmery is great. I tested the PH in the first day and it was already 9. Loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Great Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Great pitcher, our tap water tastes much better than before.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Once I figured out how to put the lid on, have had absolutely no problems. Need to order more filters, and am thinking of buying a second for our summer home
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Buy better alkaline water filters, because the ones that come with the pitcher don’t last!
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher works great, but when I ran water through the filters that came with it. They maybe had one good use of alkalinity and the it went acidic. I know this because I bought some alkaline water drop testers from amazon to test the filters life span over time. And when I compared it to other alkaline water filters that I’ve bought from amazon also. The other filters like (Gold Stone) actually did better and lasted longer than the filters that came with the pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Errol

customer_reviews.title: Good ph Balance. Lid cover could be better
customer_reviews.text: I tested the alkalinity of the water using test strips. It really does increase the alkaline level compared to our unfiltered tap water. The top cover, how ever, has a finiky lid which requires that you push down on the seff-closing lid while filling it with water. A little bit annoying, but not a big deal. Also, these are the least expensive replacement 'alkaline' filters I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It doesn’t work. Left is Great Value filtered water. Second is tap. Third is with this pitcher. Fourth is Essentia. No discernible difference between tap and the pitcher. Waste of money. Will be returning. Slow shipping, too. Try something else. The reviews that say it work must be from paid reviewers or altered by Amazon. DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, broken on receipt
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews and chose this product. Ordered two. One has no flap spring and the flap just laying in the bottom of box. The lid won;t stay on. THERE ARE DEFINITE QUALITY ISSUES...returning the messed up one.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: My tap water taste so much better now that I started using this Alkaline Water Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: My tap water taste so much better now that I started using this Alkaline Water Pitcher. I had been buying bottle water but I can save money by using this system & get great tasting water too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Misleading on where product is made . We specifically were looking for a product made in the USA . We were disappointed to see made in China on the box. Also the date display does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already having problems 1 month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of the water, ease of use related to assembly. The digital days counter works fine for me. No problems. However, after a little over a month of use, it is taking over an hour to filter 8 cups of water. When I initially purchased it, the time was approximately 20-30 minutes. Very unhappy with this aspect of the pitcher. I have emailed Wamery and am now waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Prompt order processing, product received prior to expected delivery, very happy with purchase, would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gout sufferers pay heed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing.. since I started using this for my drinking and cooking water, my issues with gout have disappeared! Having ice water on hand makes my son choose it for his fluids and I am convinced on the importance of maintaining an alkaline state in the body for health, which this helps with!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Brita filters
customer_reviews.text: This item works really well with Brita filters since I had a few of them left over, and overall a good quality product with excellent instructions
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Wamery filters are far better than others for taste. The pitcher is elegant and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: pH up just like advertised. Water tastes great and has no funny odor
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Issue with filter indicator
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited to start using this pitcher and one of the reasons I decided on this model was the LCD filter indicator. Unfortunately, I and 2 other reasonably intelligent adults followed the directions to set/reset the indicator and it keeps reverting to off. I had also purchased 3 extra filters, knowing I would love this...now not so much...just unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher appeared to be used. Small lid in top does not work nor the timer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pitcher and it appears to filter well but the top lid does not stay shut. I read where it was supposed to have a spring. We have no spring! Also you cannot set the timer for replacing the filter that is in the lid. It looked like someone before me had tried to press the timer also since there were dents in the plastic. I can live without the timer but having a piece of blue painter tape holding the small lid closed is really not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes good but did not alkalize
customer_reviews.text: Received the shipment yesterday. Water tastes much better than that from Brita or Pur. However Wamery did not alkalize water. The first batch measured pH at around 7.3. I still will keep this. I guess the dechlorination and mineralization gives the better tasting.
customer_reviews.author: hechong

customer_reviews.title: The water tastes really good
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes really good. The bottle is very nice. The only thing that I did not like is the digital timer. It doesn’t work as it said it would.

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure How Its All Supposed to Work
customer_reviews.text: When I received this water pitcher I was very impressed with the look of it. I'm just a little bit confused as to how the timer works that lets you know when to change the filter. I pressed it once and saw the double zero and the again to see how long it will last which I first I think I did see something but it was gone so fast and has not reappeared. Also how the water fills without any indication near the opening is really confusing. A little pamphlet with instructions would have been helpful. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTING

product_meta.title: Alkaline Water Pitcher - 2 Liters 8 Cup, Free Filter Cartridge Included, Increases Water pH, Removes Lead, Chlorine, Copper and More, Fast Ionizer, Purifier Jug Enhanced 2020 Model
feature_bullets: 💧 INSTANT ALKALINE WATER: With this water filter pitcher transform your hard tap water into a clean drinkable water to energize and revitalize your body, meeting NSF/ANSI standards, improving its taste and increasing the PH between 8.5 and 9. It also provides low negative ORP:-200-100mv.

💧 A HEALTHY DIET: Experts recommend that 70-80% of a person’s diet should come from alkaline forming foods and 20-30% acid forming foods, like shown on picture 3.This water pitcher will help washing acid waste products from cells and tissues, slowing aging and reducing fat cells to reduce weight.

💧 CONVENIENCE: This filter pitcher is tested to last for 42 Gallons, equivalent to 1 month of use if you fill it 3 times a day or 2 month if you fill it twice a day. It reduces Chlorine, Zinc, Copper, Mercury, Cadmium and Lead matching NSF/ANSI standards. Save money and lose the water bottle.Includes one cartridge.

💧 VITALITY: A balanced PH diet optimizes your Digestive, Circulatory, Immune, Respiratory, Nervous, Excretory and, Muscular System. In other words, by drinking alkaline water you are helping your body from many diseases and boosting your energy.

💧 TECHNOLOGY & COMMITMENT: Our lab developed the ultimate Water pitcher filter to get the most of your tap water, help save money and avoid the consuming of 930 plastic bottles per filter pack. Additionally, with your order you are helping NGOs to preserve natural resources for future generations. We are 100% money back guarantee, try us now!
